result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael R Welter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Case called:  2:14 pm
Clerk: Kassidi.
Includes cases 14CF280, 14CF533, and 14CF1083. 
State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster. Defendant appears in person and with Atty John Bliss. 
Atty Pluster files an Amended Information in case 13CF863.
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to DRI 14CF280 Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony), both counts in 14CF533, and 14CF1083 Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony) and Ct. 3 (BJ-Felony) .  
PLEA: 
13CF863>> NO CONTEST- Ct. 1 (Criminal Damage to Property, Domestic Abuse), Ct. 2 (Disorderly Conduct, Domestic Abuse), Ct. 3 (Resisting an Officer, Repeater), Ct. 4 (Misdemeanor BJ, Repeater).
14CF280>> NO CONTEST-Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony).
14CF1083>> NO CONTEST-Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony).
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
Victim D.W. reads Victim Impact Statement. 
Atty Bliss makes statement.
Defedant makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS: With hold sentence. 3 years probation CONDITIONS: Must enroll and complete the SAFE Program or equivalent program, AODA and follow up treatment as reccommended, Absolute sobriety alcohol and drugs, other counseling deemed appropriate, Court Costs, and 2 DA Surcharges, DNA Surcharge on only the 14CF cases that charges are on. No Objection to probation transfer to Langlade County. 
Adjourned: 2:30 pm

ADDRESS INFO for Michael R Welter
Current: 5634 Hwy 64, Bryant, WI 54418 United States  (Effective: 01-09-2015)
Prior: W5693 State Hwy 64, Bryant, WI 54418 United States

Case called: 3:38pm. INCLUDES 14CF280, 14CF533 - Prelims, 14CF1083 - Initial Appearance.  Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster. Defendant appears by Atty Jack Bliss. Crt proceeds with Initial Appearance on 14CF1083. COURT QUASHES ARREST WARRANT. W/R.  Address: 5634 HWY 64, Bryant WI 54418. State moves for cash bond. Arguments. Atty Bliss moves for non waivable no contact to be lifted. Arguments.  BOND - $5,000 Signature with 1st $750 in cash; Conditions: Non waivable No Contact D.W. Crt addresses time limits for prelim. Time limits not waived. DATES: Prelim 1/14/15 @ 9am on 14CF1083. Crt proceeds with Waiver of Prelim. filed in 14CF280 & 14CF533. Court questions deft as to waiver. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. Informations filed.  Readings Waived. Plea:  NOT GUILTY on 14CF280 & 14CF533. Bond:  Continued. DATES already set on 14CF280 & 14CF533. Adj: 3:51pm.
Jury Trial on March 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on January 30, 2015 at 09:45 am.
Preliminary Hearing on January 8, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

Case called: 2:38pm. INCLUDES 13CF863, 14CF280, 14CF533. Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster. Defendant appears by Atty Jack Bliss. Matter set for Plea. State indicates Defendant does not want to Plea today. State moves for Prelims to be set on 14CF files and JT on all 3 files. No objection by Atty Bliss. Crt grants. Bond to Continue. Adjourned: 2:28pm.
